channel.title: Story Bored
channel.itunes:author: Nick, Laura, and Gavin
channel.description: (Story Bored contains strong language and occasional dirty humor! So make sure you're cool with that!) Do you miss the good old days? Saturday mornings spent chilling on a couch, eating a whole box of cereal, and watching some cartoons with your buds? Now you can relive the glory days while all by your lonely self. Introducing Story Bored! Join Nick, Laura, and Gavin, three self-proclaimed masters of the impenetrable, arcane knowledge of animation, and listen as we make stupid jokes about your favorite (and less than favorite) cartoons that'll make you laugh twelve times to Sunday.

item.title: Episode 20- Amphibia
item.description:
Gavin, Nick, and Laura have recently come upon a whimsical-looking music box. They open it up...and are sucked into Amphibia, a wonderfully friendly and dangerous world! It's full of frogs, toads, bugs, frogs, big snails, frogs, and friends...which are FROGS!! Join us as we explore this swampy place and love every minute of it!

LINKS!!

Follow us on social media: twitter.com/StoryBored_Cast storyboredcast.tumblr.com/

item.title: Episode 19- Back at the Barnyard
item.description:
Hey everyone, I hope you're ready for complete and UDDER inanity! Join Story Bored as we try to keep ourselves from having a COW about the weird sequel series to a weird Nickelodeon film about barnyard animals riding motorcycles or something! We hope we'll a-MOO-se you in the most rip-roarin', cow pokin', farm handlin' episode of Story Bored you've ever HERD!

Please save us from this stilted CGI hell.

LINKS!!

Follow us on social media: twitter.com/StoryBored_Cast storyboredcast.tumblr.com/ Email us- storyboredpodcast@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 18- Final Space
item.description:
Location: Deep Space, The sound of the Final Countdown can be faintly heard in the distance. Captain's log, Stardate 14-706 Gavin, Nick, and Laura have embarked on a mission to review the animation known as "Final Space". Unfortunately hilarity ensued. There were no survivors.

item.title: Episode 17- Summer Camp Island
item.description:
Tired? Overworked? Take a load off, as you listen to Gavin, Nick, and Laura talk about Summer Camp Island. This absolute blanket of a show will water your crops, do your taxes, and leave you rested and rejuvenated for what's to come.

item.title: Episode 16- Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century
item.description:
You've heard of Sherlock Holmes before right? Well not like this, get ready for time travel, drug fueled honey splurges, and a should-be case of deja vu as Gavin, Nick, and Laura reveal their takes on Sherlock Holmes in the 22nd Century.

By the way, this was our first fan suggested episode, so a warm thanks to Alex M ^-^

item.title: Episode 15- Story Bored Rerun 1
item.description:
WE'RE BACK! And we've got something special for you! This is our first Story Bored Rerun, where we take a look at all of the shows we've watched thus far and give them awards! So put on your red carpet best, sit down, and actually you don't have to dress up all fancy, we sure didn't.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 14- We Bare Bears
item.description:
Want a show with lots of wit, a ton of heart, and is just BURSTING with charm? Let's have a look at Cartoon Network's We Bare Bears! There's breaking and entering, petty theivery, getting stranded on a deserted island, crashing a car! Okay, that makes it sound way less chill than it really is. It's really sweet, we swear! So sit back and get ready, cause we'll be there when you turn that corner and jump out the bush, with a great big loving smile!

LINKS!!

Follow us on social media: twitter.com/StoryBored_Cast storyboredcast.tumblr.com/

item.title: Episode 13- She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
item.description:
Okay, we got what you want, for realsies this time! We discuss the new Netflix original She-Ra and the Princesses of Power! Join us for amazing characters, great writing, and tanks made out of butter.

item.title: Episode 12- She-Ra Princess of Power
item.description:
The new She-Ra reboot has been amassing fans as of late due to its interesting story and charming art style. So that’s why we here at Story Bored decided to watch the old 1980s version instead. Tune in as we try to explain our strange sense of ironic and genuine enjoyment at this gem of a show.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 11- Hilda
item.description:
We explore the magical world of Hilda! Its about to get cozy as HECK in here! So grab your fluffiest blankets, a pair of slippers, a warm cup of a beverage of your choice, or none of those because I'm not the boss of you, and join us as we discuss the charming Netflix original series!

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 10- Sonic Boom
item.description:
Happy New Year, everyone! Join our intrepid hosts for another jorney through the land of animated series based on video games. This one is a furry blue trudge through mediocridy, while surprisingly hiding some absolute bangers of jokes. Almost like an alegory for a certain game francise...

item.title: Episode 9- Captain N the Game Master
item.description:
To celebrate the release of Smash Ultimate, Gavin, Nick, and Laura have decided to subject themselves to the poorest representation of all their favorite Nintendo characters. Listen as the Story Bored cast reviews Captain N the Game Master, and all of it’s inaccuracies, narcissism, and kickflips.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 8- Johnny Test
item.description:
Witness the souls of our intrepid hosts slowly leave their bodies as they tell you about the horrible void of radical tweenage content that is Johnny Test! They sat through five episodes of stilted animation with an uneccesary number of sound effects, with nary a good joke in sight to soothe their pains, just for you!

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 7- Over the Garden Wall (Part 2)
item.description:
Part two of Story Bored's journey into The Unknown, with the return of special guest Sam! Join us as we continue to gush about this wonderful miniseries. Once again, we recommend that you've watched Over the Garden Wall in its entirety before listening to this, you don't want this gem to be spoiled for you!

LINKS!!

Follow us on social media: twitter.com/StoryBored_Caststoryboredcast.tumblr.com/

item.title: Episode 6- Over the Garden Wall (Part 1)
item.description:
An extra-special two-part episode, featuring Gavin's sister Sam, an extra-special guest, for an extra-special miniseries! Over the Garden Wall is an absolute gem and a yearly tradition for all of us, so we needed an extra person and an extra episode to fit in all of our enthusiasm! If you've never watched Over the Garden Wall, we implore you to please watch it before we spoil it for you!

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 5- Samurai Jack (Season 1)
item.description:
Long ago in a distant land... Story Bored travels into the distant future to take a look at the crazy world of Samurai Jack. Laura pets a talking dog. Gavin fights a lava monster. Nick brushes up on his Scottish slang. And they all laugh at a Cajun Alligator.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 4- Chowder
item.description:
Follow us into a delightfully wacky world where you can find impressively spot-on character names, a ton of fake food you want to eat, deep connections to a rock man that says only one word, and characters that manage to be disgusting yet oddly endearing. Come on in, feel free to do some looking! Stay a while, please we're so lonely.

LINKS!!

Follow us on social media: twitter.com/StoryBored_Caststoryboredcast.tumblr.com/

item.title: Episode 3- Invader Zim
item.description:
Break out your emoticons and your Hot Topic gift cards, cause we're going back in time to Laura's cartoon of choice in her middle school days! Expect TV-Y rated body horror, everyone-is-an-idiot syndrome, "random" humor, and some surprise guests in the form of beetles.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 2- Speed Racer (1967)
item.description:
We take a look into Nick's nostalgic past, which includes hokey 60's animation, a number of on and off-screen casualties, radical rides, and a lot of senseless, disjointed yelling. Get ready to see Nick's childhood ripped apart in front of his very eyes! We're sorry, Nick.

LINKS!!

item.title: Episode 1- Kirby Right Back At Ya!
item.description:
We take a look at the anime adaptation of one of our favorite video game series! A show with almost no continuity taken from the games, a large talking snail man, immense property damage, and a rather annoying supporting cast. It's pretty good though, don't get us wrong.
